ParameterValue.Name: inputGridCoverage
ParameterValue.Label: Input Grid Coverage
ParameterValue.Description: Coverage that will be processed. This can be a reference URI to a GeoTiff or a WCS request when returning a GeoTiff

ParameterValue.Name: image
ParameterValue.Label: image of interest
ParameterValue.Description: number of image of interest, needed in case more than one image is encoded in a GeoTIFF: initial value is 1

ParameterValue.Name: band
ParameterValue.Label: band of interest
ParameterValue.Description: and for which the statistics shall be provided: initial value is 1

ParameterValue.Name: valueToIgnore
ParameterValue.Label: Value to ignore
ParameterValue.Description: Some values might be known to not be the minimum value. They should be ignored in output statistics (e.g. 0 or -9999), Example: valueToIgnore = -9999

ParameterValue.Name: minValueResult
ParameterValue.Label: Minium Value
ParameterValue.Description: The minimum value found in the dataset
